reviews.review: Basically just Portal one with more mechanics and more jokes. An absolute joy to play.

Its a first-person game that will leave you feeling "Big-Brain". What more could you ask for.
Basically two campaigns for the already extremely low price:
Multiplayer & Singleplayer
You also get to listen to a robot insult you 24/7. In normal circumstances, I'd say shield your ego, but honestly, everyone needs to experience Glados.
Just once.
funny killer robot ho died is alive AGAIN!??
this is a ripoff of portal 1
Can't say yes enough to express how much I recommend this beauty - it's a masterpiece!
Great Game! I would say this game is better with friends in the co-op, but the singleplayer is still really good!
Wheatley is very funny i love this game so much and the area's you explore are so cool and have so much attention to detail.

NIce game with tricky levels. Good for training concetration and IQ. Nice story and level design, however it was too short. 7 Hours to play through. Coop and custom maps are not in my interests. I vote only for single player story mode. In overall I recommend for halflife and portal 1 fans. Buy only in discount!

Man, after replaying this game and completing it in one sitting just now, all I have to say is this. I miss you, Valve. The good old days when you were my favorite video game company, the games you made were of an unsurpassed  quality, and just the thought of what could come next if you woke up is enough to keep me holding onto hope. This game is a 15.5/10 masterpiece, not just this game, but Portal 1, Team Fortress 2, the Half Life series and everything else Valve has done. If you're on the fence about buying this game, PLEASE DO. It is a must play, and I would give everything to experience the Portal series for the first time again. until then, I'll just keep testing. For science.

Some of my fondest gaming memories are from the era of The Orange Box. Now, many years later I've finally bought and finished Portal 2. What a great game on every aspect. At the current Winter Sale price you'd be cheating yourself not buying it. Heck, even the full price is a steal.
